Header: Broad agreement on devolution of power
Content: Minister Lakshman Kiriella says all parties have a broad agreement on devolution of power.Minister Lakshman Kiriella said that there is no agreement about abolishing of the Executive Presidency as well as the Electoral system. He said that devolution of power was discussed and more than the Chief Ministers from the Northern areas, Chief Ministers from the Southern areas asked for more powers. The Minister said this while attending to open several roads developed in Kandy, Galagedara area. Galagedara UNP organizer Padmalal de Alwis and people in the area were present on the occasion.
